attributes.action: Legislate the right of the electorate to recall and dismiss a representative.
attributes.background:
Give the power to the electorate to get
 elected officials out office when they are not doing their job.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or House of Commons to take.

There is already legislation that allows an MP to be recalled in certain circumstances. You can find out more here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0004/184324/Recall-Act-Factsheet.pdf

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the changes you would like to see to the law.
